name: Broken Heart (DatTrashPanda)
description:
Install instructions

WASD or left joystick to move

J + K or 'X' + 'Y' to attack

'A' or W or Space to jump

Made to participate in the 1Bit Weekend Game Jam, Enjoy!

3D Modelling by Sam Jay

Programming and Shaders by Daniel Piero

2D Art and Game Design by Duncan Cale

We used a royalty free audio track by Komiku called Beach, and an open source font by Rob Meek called Pixelated.
